4359.verse: وَلِبُيُوتِهِمْ|And for their houses|154|173|15499$أَبْوَٲبًا|doors|71|109|15500$وَسُرُرًا|and couches|104|142|15501$عَلَيْهَا|upon which|95|133|1269$يَتَّكِــُٔونَ|they recline|98|117|15502$

4360.verse: وَزُخْرُفًا‌ۚ|And ornaments of gold.|174|181|15503$وَإِن|And not (is)|99|113|213$كُلُّ|all|49|63|575$ذَٲلِكَ|that|64|78|28$لَمَّا|but|47|61|3471$مَتَـٰعُ|an enjoyment|110|124|2681$ٱلْحَيَوٲةِ|(of) the life|96|103|817$ٱلدُّنْيَا‌ۚ|(of) the world.|117|132|818$وَٱلْأَخِرَةُ|And the Hereafter|139|168|4213$عِندَ|with|56|86|521$رَبِّكَ|your Lord|82|112|1322$لِلْمُتَّقِينَ|(is) for the righteous.|163|178|34$

4361.verse: وَمَن|And whoever|106|125|1012$يَعْشُ|turns away|94|131|15504$عَن|from|54|91|1105$ذِكْرِ|(the) remembrance|147|184|5228$ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ|(of) the Most Gracious,|175|194|3$نُقَيِّضْ|We appoint|95|111|15505$لَهُۥ|for him|65|97|977$شَيْطَـٰنًا|a devil,|86|118|4465$فَهُوَ|then he|71|103|1591$لَهُۥ|(is) to him|88|120|977$قَرِينٌ|a companion.|108|124|14625$

4362.verse: وَإِنَّهُمْ|And indeed, they|133|141|5517$لَيَصُدُّونَهُمْ|surely, turn them away|174|190|15506$عَنِ|from|54|70|1663$ٱلسَّبِيلِ|the Path|83|99|1019$وَيَحْسَبُونَ|and they think|116|132|6358$أَنَّهُم|that they|83|91|461$مُّهْتَدُونَ|(are) guided.|106|106|5781$

4363.verse: حَتَّىٰٓ|Until|64|83|526$إِذَا|when|55|93|1370$جَآءَنَا|he comes to Us|123|161|4839$قَالَ|he says,|76|114|309$يَـٰلَيْتَ|`O would that|114|152|13540$بَيْنِى|between me|101|120|5473$وَبَيْنَكَ|and between you|135|151|11476$بُعْدَ|(were the) distance|152|183|15507$ٱلْمَشْرِقَيْنِ|(of) the East and the West.`|214|245|15508$فَبِئْسَ|How wretched is|130|146|3596$ٱلْقَرِينُ|the companion!|122|122|15509$

4364.verse: وَلَن|And will never|112|118|229$يَنفَعَكُمُ|benefit you|95|107|13955$ٱلْيَوْمَ|the Day,|77|89|2217$إِذ|when|55|67|1198$ظَّلَمْتُمْ|you have wronged,|147|159|515$أَنَّكُمْ|that you|77|89|1632$فِى|(will be) in|89|95|89$ٱلْعَذَابِ|the punishment|122|340|482$مُشْتَرِكُونَ|sharing.|118|336|14601$

4366.verse: فَإِمَّا|And whether|104|146|399$نَذْهَبَنَّ بِكَ|We take you away,|149|233|15510$فَإِنَّا|then indeed, We,|134|218|4856$مِنْهُم|from them|87|129|730$مُّنتَقِمُونَ|(will) take retribution.|164|164|13902$

4367.verse: أَوْ|Or|41|49|154$نُرِيَنَّكَ|We show you|109|126|8169$ٱلَّذِى|that which|91|108|138$وَعَدْنَـٰهُمْ|We have promised them,|184|201|15511$فَإِنَّا|then indeed, We|129|146|4856$عَلَيْهِم|over them|87|95|22$مُّقْتَدِرُونَ|have full power.|126|126|15512$

4368.verse: فَٱسْتَمْسِكْ|So hold fast|110|117|15513$بِٱلَّذِىٓ|to that which|110|124|597$أُوحِىَ|is revealed|91|105|5833$إِلَيْكَ‌ۖ|to you.|68|82|45$إِنَّكَ|Indeed, you|99|113|340$عَلَىٰ|(are) on|74|88|52$صِرَٲطٍ|a Path|89|96|1271$مُّسْتَقِيمٍ|Straight.|85|85|1272$

4369.verse: وَإِنَّهُۥ|And indeed, it|112|132|1195$لَذِكْرٌ|(is) surely, a Reminder|168|207|15514$لَّكَ|for you|67|106|323$وَلِقَوْمِكَ‌ۖ|and your people,|131|170|15515$وَسَوْفَ|and soon|90|110|4577$تُسْــَٔلُونَ|you will be questioned.|172|172|1229$

4370.verse: وَسْــَٔلْ|And ask|74|80|15516$مَنْ|(those) whom|112|124|76$أَرْسَلْنَا|We sent|82|94|1342$مِن قَبْلِكَ|before you|102|114|47$مِن|of|50|62|53$رُّسُلِنَآ|Our Messengers;|131|143|10485$أَجَعَلْنَا|did We make|104|110|15517$مِن دُونِ|besides|101|138|224$ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ|the Most Gracious|140|214|3$ءَالِهَةً|gods|72|146|5479$يُعْبَدُونَ|to be worshipped?|141|178|15518$

4371.verse: وَلَقَدْ|And certainly|107|113|640$أَرْسَلْنَا|We sent|82|94|1342$مُوسَىٰ|Musa|83|96|499$بِـَٔـايَـٰتِنَآ|with Our Signs|116|128|408$إِلَىٰ|to|53|66|118$فِرْعَوْنَ|Firaun|93|106|2649$وَمَلَإِيْهِۦ|and his chiefs,|116|122|6651$فَقَالَ|and he said,|101|116|332$إِنِّى|`Indeed, I am|112|142|312$رَسُولُ|a Messenger|103|134|6924$رَبِّ|(of the) Lord|105|136|7$ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ|(of) the worlds.`|132|147|8$

4372.verse: فَلَمَّا|But when|82|102|141$جَآءَهُم|he came to them|133|172|853$بِـَٔـايَـٰتِنَآ|with Our Signs,|121|160|408$إِذَا|behold!|68|107|1370$هُم|They|53|92|49$مِّنْهَا|at them|72|92|246$يَضْحَكُونَ|laughed.|116|116|15519$

4359.verse: And for their houses - doors and couches [of silver] upon which to recline

4360.verse: And gold ornament. But all that is not but the enjoyment of worldly life. And the Hereafter with your Lord is for the righteous.

4361.verse: And whoever is blinded from remembrance of the Most Merciful - We appoint for him a devil, and he is to him a companion.

4362.verse: And indeed, the devils avert them from the way [of guidance] while they think that they are [rightly] guided

4363.verse: Until, when he comes to Us [at Judgement], he says [to his companion], "Oh, I wish there was between me and you the distance between the east and west - how wretched a companion."

4364.verse: And never will it benefit you that Day, when you have wronged, that you are [all] sharing in the punishment.

4365.verse: Then will you make the deaf hear, [O Muhammad], or guide the blind or he who is in clear error?

4366.verse: And whether [or not] We take you away [in death], indeed, We will take retribution upon them.

4367.verse: Or whether [or not] We show you that which We have promised them, indeed, We are Perfect in Ability.

4368.verse: So adhere to that which is revealed to you. Indeed, you are on a straight path.

4369.verse: And indeed, it is a remembrance for you and your people, and you [all] are going to be questioned.

4370.verse: And ask those We sent before you of Our messengers; have We made besides the Most Merciful deities to be worshipped?

4371.verse: And certainly did We send Moses with Our signs to Pharaoh and his establishment, and he said, "Indeed, I am the messenger of the Lord of the worlds."

4372.verse: But when he brought them Our signs, at once they laughed at them.
